title: SMC_GCODE_TEXT (Struct)
text:
TYPE SMC_GCODE_TEXT : STRUCT
This data type is used to transmit the string of the last interpreted line
of the CNC file from the function block
SMC_NCInterpreter
to the
function block
SMC_GCodeViewer
.

rows.Name: bNewLine
rows.Comment: TRUEwhen a new line has been decoded in this cycle;FALSEelse

rows.Name: bClearList
rows.Comment:
TRUEwhen the interpreter has been (re-) started.  This implies
that a buffer that may store previous lines should be emptied.

rows.Name: objectId
rows.Comment: The object id of the object created by the given line.
